title: KNOSIS Drop Killer New Single, "SHINMON" And Announce Debut Record, GENKNOSIS
description: Knosis absolutely rip, kill, destroy... you name it, they do it on their single, "SHINMON." The post KNOSIS Drop Killer New Single, "SHINMON" And Announce Debut Record, GENKNOSIS appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Isabella Ambrosio
byline: By Isabella Ambrosio Published 6 hours ago
excerpt: Knosis absolutely rip, kill, destroy... you name it, they do it on their single, "SHINMON."
text: Japanese-renowned multi-instrumentalist and vocalist Ryo Kinoshita is the lead of brand new project, Knosis – a thrashing, blast-beat-ing, head-banging metal band. Celebrating the announcement of their debut record, GENKNOSIS, due out August 1st via SharpTone Records, Knosis has released a brand new single, "SHINMON," and an accompanying music video. The ex-Crystal Lake frontman is known for his sheer talent and skill, fully conceptualised by the visionary project that is both explosive and emotional. Alongside Kinoshita's vocals that showcase his expansive capabilities as he coasts through guttural screams and higher melodies, the project is truly one to keep your eye on. You can pre-save Knosis' debut record here, and check out GENKNOSIS' track listing below. GENKNOSIS SHINMON FUHAI (feat. Yukina Hanabie) YAKUSAI SEISAI KURUIBI IMIONI DOKUNUMA TANEBI ANGETSU Want More Metal? html:
Japanese-renowned multi-instrumentalist and vocalist Ryo Kinoshita is the lead of brand new project, Knosis – a thrashing, blast-beat-ing, head-banging metal band.

Celebrating the announcement of their debut record, GENKNOSIS, due out August 1st via SharpTone Records, Knosis has released a brand new single, "SHINMON," and an accompanying music video.

The ex-Crystal Lake frontman is known for his sheer talent and skill, fully conceptualised by the visionary project that is both explosive and emotional. Alongside Kinoshita's vocals that showcase his expansive capabilities as he coasts through guttural screams and higher melodies, the project is truly one to keep your eye on.

You can pre-save Knosis' debut record here, and check out GENKNOSIS' track listing below.

  1. GENKNOSIS
  2. SHINMON
  3. FUHAI (feat. Yukina Hanabie)
  4. YAKUSAI
  5. SEISAI
  6. KURUIBI
  7. IMIONI
  8. DOKUNUMA
  9. TANEBI
  10. ANGETSU
